TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationConfiguration extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationConfiguration Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序以使用 窗体模式。

span.span: Configures an ASP.NET application to use the forms modality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种方法以编程方式访问和修改`forms`元素配置的`authentication`部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `forms` element of a configuration `authentication` section. 此类型是包含的组的一部分，则，和类型。This type is part of a group that includes the ,the , and the types. 类型而不是集合类型直接影响基础配置标记。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可将信息写入到根据定义的部分属性的限制配置文件的相关节其值是。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 任何尝试在不允许在层次结构中级别的配置文件中写入将导致由分析器生成的错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类来读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 有关安全性和可伸缩性，建议使用外部存储库，例如数据库、 保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. 此对象可用于访问其成员。You can use this object to access its members. 配置文件将包含类似于下面的设置。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. **请注意**如果您使用`credentials`部分中，一定要遵循的指导原则，详见[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。**Note** If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关详细信息构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (msdn.microsoft.com) 为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信。"For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义基于窗体的身份验证是否应使用 cookie 来交换用户信息。The property defines whether forms-based authentication should use a cookie to exchange user information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the enforcement mode of the cookie.

value.span: 如果应用程序面向 .NET Framework 4.7.2 或更高版本，则默认值为 ；否则默认值为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As FormsAuthenticationCredentials

summary.span: 获取用户名和密码的 集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of user names and passwords.

value.span: 包含用户名和密码的 集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the user names and passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取的用户名和密码来在基于窗体的身份验证期间使用。The property gets the user names and passwords to use during forms-based authentication. > [!NOTE] > 需要安全时，应使用存储的用户名和密码，备选的方法例如，在数据库中存储。When security is required, you should use alternative ways of storing the user names and passwords; for example, in a database store. 如果您决定使用此集合，则应使用提供的加密功能。If you decide to use this collection, you should use the provided encryption facility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 获取或设置默认的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the default URL.

value.span: 要在身份验证后将请求重定向到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to which to redirect the request after authentication.

value.span: 默认值为 default.aspx。

span.span: The default value is default.aspx.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户直接访问登录页或返回 URL，则不使用。The is used if the user accesses the login page directly or if a return URL is not provided. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问。The following code example shows how to access the . 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 获取或设置要与 Forms 身份验证 Cookie 一同发送的域名。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain name to be sent with forms authentication cookies.

value.span: 用于输出 Forms 身份验证 Cookie 的域的名称。

span.span: The name of the domain for the outgoing forms authentication cookies.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串。

span.span: Default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于身份验证 cookie。The is used for the authentication cookies. 此属性对应的值。This property corresponds to the value of . 此设置将优先于`domain`窗体身份验证 cookie 的节的属性。This setting will take precedence over the `domain` attribute of the section for forms authentication cookies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableCrossAppRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableCrossAppRedirects : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示通过身份验证的用户是否可以重定向到其他应用程序中的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether authenticated users can be redirected to URLS in other applications.

value.span: 如果通过身份验证的用户可以重定向到其他应用程序中的 URL，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: true if authenticated users can be redirected to URLs in other applications; otherwise false.

value.span: 默认值为 false。

span.span: The default is false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值设置的`forms`验证部分中的一个配置节。The property value sets the enableCrossAppRedirects attribute of the `forms` section in the authentication section of a configuration. 通过检查属性方法时重定向到不在当前应用程序的 URL。The property is checked by the method when the redirection is to a URL that is not in the current application. 如果为 true，然后执行重定向; 否则将浏览器重定向到定义中的页属性。If is true, then the redirect is performed; otherwise the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 在执行重定向跨应用程序时，必须确保多个属性，在`form`已经过身份验证的应用程序之间重复的配置节。When performing redirects across applications, you must ensure that several of the attributes in the `form` configuration section are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[跨应用程序的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的重定向 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the redirection URL for the request.

value.span: 当用户未进行身份验证时要将请求重定向到的 URL。

span.span: The URL the request is redirected to when the user is not authenticated.

value.span: 默认值为 login.aspx。

span.span: The default value is login.aspx.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的重定向 URL 的请求时用户未经过身份验证或任何有效的身份验证 cookie 时存在。The property specifies the redirection URL for the request when the user is not authenticated or when no valid authentication cookie exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问。The following code example shows how to access the . 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 获取或设置 Cookie 路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie path.

value.span: 要用于身份验证的 HTTP Cookie 的路径。

span.span: The path of the HTTP cookie to use for authentication.

value.span: 默认值为斜杠 (/)，表示 Web 应用程序的根。

span.span: The default value is a slash (/), which represents the Web-application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示身份验证 cookie 所在的位置，并且传输以及身份验证 cookie 本身。The property indicates where the authentication cookie resides and is transmitted along with the authentication cookie itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. span.span: Gets or sets the encryption type used to encrypt the cookie.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

value.span: **请注意**确保要用于此属性的默认值，如果你希望数据验证和加密来帮助保护 cookie。

span.span: **Note** Be sure to use the default value for this property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie.

value.span: 此选项使用已配置的数据验证算法（基于 ）。

span.span: This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm based on the .

value.span: 如果 Triple-DES (3DES) 可用并且密钥足够长（48 字节或更长），则可将 Triple-DES 用于加密。

span.span: Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if available and if the key is long enough (48 bytes or more).

value.span: 若要增强对 Cookie 的保护，您还可以将 设置为 。

span.span: To improve the protection of your cookie, you may also want to set the to .

[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输身份验证信息时是否需要安全套接字层 (SSL) 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection is required when transmitting authentication information.

value.span: 如果需要 SSL 连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is required; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，Web 应用程序将拒绝不使用 SSL 连接的所有窗体身份验证请求。If is `true`, a Web application rejects all the forms authentication requests that do not use an SSL connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性引用中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。The following code example shows how to access the property Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证可调过期。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication sliding expiration.

value.span: 如果启用可调过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`身份验证 cookie 的有效间隔重置为到期的时间、属性值。When the is set to `true`, the time interval during which the authentication cookie is valid is reset to the expiration property value. 如果该用户浏览一半超时过期后，将发生这种情况。This happens if the user browses after half of the timeout has expired. 例如，如果使用可调到期设置 20 分钟的到期时间，用户可以在下午 2:00 点访问网站和接收 cookie 设置为在下午 2:20 点过期。For example, if you set an expiration of 20 minutes by using sliding expiration, a user can visit the site at 2:00 PM and receive a cookie that is set to expire at 2:20 PM. 如果用户 2:10 PM 后访问该网站，只会更新过期。The expiration is only updated if the user visits the site after 2:10 PM. 如果用户在下午 2:09 点访问站点时，cookie 因为一半的到期时间尚未过不会更新。If the user visits the site at 2:09 PM, the cookie is not updated because half of the expiration time has not passed. 如果用户然后等待 12 分钟下午 2:21 访问网站，cookie 将过期。If the user then waits 12 minutes, visiting the site at 2:21 PM, the cookie will be expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode TicketCompatibilityMode { System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对于票证到期日期使用协调世界时 (UTC) 还是本地时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date.

value.span: 票证到期日期兼容模式。

span.span: The ticket expiration-date compatibility mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是表示本地时间枚举值。The default value is local time as expressed by the enumeration value. ## Examples [身份验证 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的 forms 元素forms Element for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8163b8b5-ea6c-46c8-b5a9-c4c3de31c0b3)

member this.Timeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证超时。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication time-out.

value.span: 以分钟为单位的时间量，经过该时间间隔后身份验证便会过期。

span.span: The amount of time in minutes after which the authentication expires.

value.span: 默认值为 30 分钟。

span.span: The default value is 30 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#10)]
